snippet: The investment vehicle of Mikhail Prokhorov, the billionaire owner of the New Jersey Nets, will buy Renaissance Capital, a Russian investment bank that has struggled to become a global financial player.
abstract: The investment vehicle of Mikhail Prokhorov, the billionaire owner of the New Jersey Nets, will buy Renaissance Capital, a Russian investment bank that has struggled to become a global financial player.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Nets Owner to Buy Russia's Renaissance Capital
